title: Is anyone else getting sick of Pantheon

replies.body:
{{champion:111}} {{item:3068}} + CotC 

U WOT M8?

(nautilus is a good way to deal with him)
Been sick of him since I started in season 2. Colossus is so good on him now as well. I loathe laning against pantheon every single time I play against one.

Been sick of him since Flask was added
It's pretty annoying to concede lane to him by default if you don't have your jg camp or pick 1 of about 5 champions that can handle him well
